title: REDice
author: REDice
created_time: July 21, 2023, 08:30:17 AMLast edit: July 21, 2023, 08:46:03 AM by REDice
content: Hi guys. . . Magandang araw sa inyong lahat. . . sinong intresado bumili ng crEx token tag 10 php lang ang bawat isa  $0.1 at may chance pa kayo manalo ng 1000 crEx token. kailangan lang ninyo ang trustwallet or metamask. and network BNB Smart Chain. at kong sakaling kailangan nyo ng cash pwede rin ninyong SELL sakin. tumanggap po ako ngbayad  BNB XRP TRX GCASH DOGE BCH. pag ang kita nitong coin lalagyan ko ng VALUE ang coin na ito.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on July 21, 2023, 08:30:17 AMsinong intresado bumili ng crEx token tag 10 php lang ang bawat isa  $0.1 10 pesos bawat isa pero $0.1 ang presyo? Binebenta mo ang worth $0.1 ng 10 pesos o baliktad na ang worth niya ay 10 pesos tapos binebenta mo ng $0.1, medyo naconfuse lang ako.Quote from: REDice on July 21, 2023, 08:30:17 AMmay chance pa kayo manalo ng 1000 crEx token. kailangan lang ninyo ang trustwallet or metamask. and network BNB Smart Chain. at kong sakaling kailangan nyo ng cash pwede rin ninyong SELL sakin. tumanggap po ako ngbayad  BNB XRP TRX GCASH DOGE BCH. pag ang kita nitong coin lalagyan ko ng VALUE ang coin na ito.Ibig sabihin, itong crex token na ito ay iba sa crex24 na nagsara. Kung wala pa siyang value ngayon tapos ibebenta pabalik sayo, hindi ba malulugi ka kapag ganun? Naco-confuse lang ako talaga, sorry. Itong token na ito created mo tapos wala pa sa market at mga exchanges, tama ba?

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Saw your previous post about creating your own site, is this working already?What's the real concept of this project and why we are going to buy a 10php worth of peso vs the $.1 which is 5 pesos lang pag nagconvert ka.If you are going to post your project here, mas ok detalyado mate and sana mag lagay ka ng link so we can easily do some research about your project.

comments.author: REDice
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on July 21, 2023, 12:13:32 PMQuote from: REDice on July 21, 2023, 08:30:17 AMsinong intresado bumili ng crEx token tag 10 php lang ang bawat isa  $0.1 10 pesos bawat isa pero $0.1 ang presyo? Binebenta mo ang worth $0.1 ng 10 pesos o baliktad na ang worth niya ay 10 pesos tapos binebenta mo ng $0.1, medyo naconfuse lang ako.Quote from: REDice on July 21, 2023, 08:30:17 AMmay chance pa kayo manalo ng 1000 crEx token. kailangan lang ninyo ang trustwallet or metamask. and network BNB Smart Chain. at kong sakaling kailangan nyo ng cash pwede rin ninyong SELL sakin. tumanggap po ako ngbayad  BNB XRP TRX GCASH DOGE BCH. pag ang kita nitong coin lalagyan ko ng VALUE ang coin na ito.Ibig sabihin, itong crex token na ito ay iba sa crex24 na nagsara. Kung wala pa siyang value ngayon tapos ibebenta pabalik sayo, hindi ba malulugi ka kapag ganun? Naco-confuse lang ako talaga, sorry. Itong token na ito created mo tapos wala pa sa market at mga exchanges, tama ba?hindi ko alam yan crex24 100%. . . oo bago lang itong na release mas nauna pa yong site ko  cry-ex.com kaysa token kasi nag error sa prefix.

comments.author: REDice
comments.body: Quote from: Johnyz on July 21, 2023, 12:57:56 PMSaw your previous post about creating your own site, is this working already?What's the real concept of this project and why we are going to buy a 10php worth of peso vs the $.1 which is 5 pesos lang pag nagconvert ka.If you are going to post your project here, mas ok detalyado mate and sana mag lagay ka ng link so we can easily do some research about your project. yes its working already. may goal ako na kailangan ma benta 1 million token worth kahit 100k lng para mailagay sa liquid or para may value na coin.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on July 21, 2023, 01:01:47 PMhindi ko alam yan crex24 100%. . . Closed exchange na siya kaya parehas kayo ng name pero wala na siya sa market. Quote from: REDice on July 21, 2023, 01:01:47 PMoo bago lang itong na release mas nauna pa yong site ko  cry-ex.com kaysa token kasi nag error sa prefix.Agree ako kay johnyz, mas maganda kung ilalagay mo mga detalye ng project mo. Magandan example yung nasa altcoin announcements natin. Kuha ka ng sample.(https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=260.0)
